Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add integration test, CLI tool, and Makefile for chart-val

## Features Added

### 1. Integration Test Suite
- `internal/diff/app/integration_test.go` with `TestIntegration_FullDiffFlow`
- Real Helm chart fixtures in `testdata/{base,head}/my-app/`
- Golden file support for reproducible test output
- `-update` flag to regenerate golden files
- Tests check Run markdown and PR comment generation

### 2. CLI Tool for Manual Testing
- `cmd/chart-val-cli/` - webhook simulator
- Simple interface: just pass a PR URL
- Automatically fetches PR details from GitHub API
- Parses PR URL: `https://github.com/owner/repo/pull/123`
- Signs webhook with HMAC SHA256
- POSTs to local webhook endpoint

### 3. Makefile
- `make build` - compile server to ./bin/chart-val
- `make build-cli` - compile CLI tool to ./bin/chart-val-cli
- `make run` - run server locally with auto-loaded config
- `make test` - run all tests
- `make test-integration` - run integration tests
- `make test-integration-update` - regenerate golden files
- `make fmt`, `make vet`, `make lint` - code quality

### 4. Configuration
- `Makefile` includes all defaults: GITHUB_APP_ID, INSTALLATION_ID, WEBHOOK_SECRET
- Loads GITHUB_PRIVATE_KEY from `chart-val.pem` at runtime
- `.env.example` for optional overrides
- `.gitignore` to protect secrets

### 5. Documentation
- Updated README with setup, testing, and architecture sections
- Simplified configuration - just place chart-val.pem and run

## Test Fixtures
- Base chart v0.1.0 with staging/prod environments
- Head chart v0.2.0 with config changes
- Golden files showing expected Check Run and PR comment output

## Quick Start
```bash
cp /path/to/key.pem chart-val.pem
make run                 # Terminal 1
make build-cli && ./bin/chart-val-cli https://github.com/owner/repo/pull/123  # Terminal 2
```
